mapper.select: SELECT ANN_NUM , ANN_CATE , CATE_NAME , ANN_TITLE , ANN_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(ANN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ANN_DATE FROM ANNOUNCEMENT ANN, ANN_CATE_LIST LIST WHERE ANN.ANN_CATE = LIST.CATE_CODE ORDER BY ANN_NUM DESC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH FIRST 4 ROWS ONLY

SELECT ANN_NUM , ANN_CATE , CATE_NAME , ANN_TITLE , ANN_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(ANN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ANN_DATE FROM ANNOUNCEMENT ANN, ANN_CATE_LIST LIST WHERE ANN.ANN_CATE = LIST.CATE_CODE ORDER BY ANN_NUM DESC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY

SELECT ANN_NUM , CATE_CODE , CATE_NAME , ANN_WRITER , ANN_TITLE , ANN_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(ANN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ANN_DATE FROM ANNOUNCEMENT ANN, ANN_CATE_LIST LIST WHERE ANN.ANN_CATE = LIST.CATE_CODE AND ANN_NUM = #{annNum}
